title: a new support idea
body:
As of now there are no main attack damage based supports. the closest things I've seen are pre-rework gangplank or kayle but they aren't inherently supports or aren't chosen as often as the others. I have decided this champ concept to mend this void that is an attack damage support role. I like to have this champion to be a yordle with sword that looks too big  for him to carry that he found somewhere on the outskirts of bandle city as it would aslo fill the yordle support role. He will use mana. he will be melee. who knows you could make him {{champion:32}} long lost friend who searches for him until he finds him in the league. 

Name: hugo the yordle with a big sword

The blade provides (passive): every 5 minute (2.5 min after 20 min) a sword shard will appear in his side of the jungle and picking it up will grant 5 ad permanently as well as some gold. his sword will get bigger per sword retrieved. He also gets 20 gold if he auto attacks an enemy champ on a 10 sec cooldown.
promotion (q): raises his sword towards the allied champ and heals the ally for base amount plus % ad 
demacia (W): Spin on the spot with sword tripping and slowing enemies for 1 s around him. If he has less % hp than the surrounding enemies he stuns them for 1 second
exert energy (e) grants a small aoe movement speed buff scaling with %ad and a base of 10% for 2 seconds.
drain evil (r) passive: hugo deals 10/25/60 true dmg on hit, active: hugo can sap the life of one oponent doing 10% plus % ad of max hp and reducing his dmg by 20/30/50% for 4 seconds
